trans-unit.source: Two QLowEnergyCharacteristic instances are considered to be equal if they refer to the same characteristic on the same remote Bluetooth Low Energy device or both instances have been default-constructed.

trans-unit.source: Two QProcessEnvironment objects are considered equal if they have the same set of key=value pairs. The comparison of keys is done case-sensitive on platforms where the environment is case-sensitive.

trans-unit.source: Two QSslConfiguration objects are considered equal if they have the exact same settings and state.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个QSslConfiguration对象具有完全相同的设置和状态，则认为它们相等。

trans-unit.source: Two APIs for using QMessageBox are provided, the property-based API, and the static functions. Calling one of the static functions is the simpler approach, but it is less flexible than using the property-based API, and the result is less informative. Using the property-based API is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 提供了两个使用QMessageBox的API，基于属性的API和静态函数。调用静态函数之一是更简单的方法，但是它不如使用基于属性的API灵活，并且结果信息较少。建议使用基于属性的API。

trans-unit.source: Two APIs for using QMessageBox are provided, the property-based API, and the static functions. Calling one of the static functions is the simpler approach, but it is less flexible than using the property-based API, and the result is less informative. Using the property-based API is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 提供了两种使用QMessageBox的API,一种是基于属性的API,一种是静态函数。调用其中一个静态函数是比较简单的方法,但它的灵活性不如使用基于属性的API,而且结果信息量较少。建议使用基于属性的API。

trans-unit.source: Two important side effects of the destructor depend on the system. In Windows, if acquire() has been called for this semaphore but not release(), release() will not be called by the destructor, nor will the resource be released when the process exits normally. This would be a program bug which could be the cause of a deadlock in another process trying to acquire the same resource. In Unix, acquired resources that are not released before the destructor is called are automatically released when the process exits.
trans-unit.target: 析构函数的两个重要副作用取决于系统。在Windows中，如果获取（）被调用为这个信号，但并不释放（），发行（）将不会被析构函数调用，也不会将资源被释放时的过程正常退出。这将是一个程序错误，可能是另一个试图获取相同资源的进程死锁的原因。在Unix中，在进程退出时，将自动释放在调用析构函数之前未释放的获取资源。

trans-unit.source: Two of the standard models provided by Qt are QStandardItemModel and QFileSystemModel. QStandardItemModel is a multi-purpose model that can be used to represent various different data structures needed by list, table, and tree views. This model also holds the items of data. QFileSystemModel is a model that maintains information about the contents of a directory. As a result, it does not hold any items of data itself, but simply represents files and directories on the local filing system.
trans-unit.target: Qt提供的两个标准模型是QStandardItemModel和QFileSystemModel。QStandardItemModel是一个多用途模型，可用于表示列表，表和树视图所需的各种不同的数据结构。该模型还保存数据项。QFileSystemModel是用于维护有关目录内容的信息的模型。结果，它本身不保存任何数据项，而仅表示本地归档系统上的文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: Two web pages are considered as belonging to the same site if they originate from the same registered domain name (for example, wikipedia.org) and scheme (for example, https). This is similar to the same-origin policy but subdomains are ignored. For example, both https://en.wikipedia.org/ and https://de.wikipedia.org/ would belong to the same site.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个网页源自相同的注册域名（例如 wikipedia.org ）和方案（例如 https ），则它们被视为属于同一站点。这类似于同源策略，但是子域将被忽略。例如， https://en.wikipedia.org/ 和 https://de.wikipedia.org/ 都属于同一个站点。

trans-unit.source: Typically it's sufficient to set this property globally using the application style hint. This property should be used when varying intervals are needed for certain MouseAreas.

trans-unit.source: Typically the engine instance would be made the parent of the reply. If the developer fails to discard the replies when finished, the engine can clean those upon destruction. Commonly, the reply also has a pointer reference back to the engine, which may be used to emit the QPlaceManagerEngine::finished() and QPlaceManagerEngine::error() signals. This is just one of many ways the reply could be implemented.
trans-unit.target: 通常，引擎实例将成为回复的 parent 。如果开发人员在完成后未能放弃答复，则引擎可以销毁这些答复。通常，回复还具有指向引擎的指针引用，该指针引用可用于发出QPlaceManagerEngine :: finished（）和QPlaceManagerEngine :: error（）信号。这只是可以执行回复的多种方式之一。

trans-unit.source: Typically the global compositor space on a desktop system is made of a contiguous or overlapping set of rectangular regions.
trans-unit.target: 通常桌面系统上的全局合成器空间是由一组连续或重叠的矩形区域组成的。

trans-unit.source: Typically the sound effect should be reused, which allows all the parsing and preparation to be done ahead of time, and only triggered when necessary. This assists with lower latency audio playback.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,声音效果应该是重复使用的,这样可以提前完成所有的解析和准备工作,只有在必要时才会触发。这有助于降低音频播放的延迟。

trans-unit.source: Typically the sound effect should be reused, which allows all the parsing and preparation to be done ahead of time, and only triggered when necessary. This is easy to achieve with QML, since you can declare your SoundEffect instance and refer to it elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 通常，应重新使用声音效果，这样可以提前进行所有解析和准备工作，并且仅在必要时触发。使用QML可以轻松实现，因为您可以声明SoundEffect实例并在其他地方引用它。

trans-unit.source: Typically the sound effect should be reused, which allows all the parsing and preparation to be done ahead of time, and only triggered when necessary. This is easy to achieve with QML, since you can declare your SoundEffect instance and refer to it elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,声音效果应该被重用,这样可以提前完成所有的解析和准备工作,只有在必要的时候才会触发。这在QML中很容易实现,因为你可以声明你的SoundEffect实例并在其他地方引用它。

trans-unit.source: Typically, QPrintDialog objects are constructed with a QPrinter object, and executed using the exec() function.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a compositor written with Qt Wayland Compositor becomes a subsystem inside a larger application manager process. Qt Wayland Compositor provides the APIs to communicate with clients and display their content on the screen. The QML APIs contain high-level APIs that easily integrate with the rest of Qt, enabling convenient animations, effects, and UI through Qt Quick. There are also C++ APIs available - if you need more low-level access.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,使用Qt Wayland Compositor编写的合成器会成为一个更大的应用程序管理器进程中的一个子系统。Qt Wayland Compositor提供了与客户端通信并在屏幕上显示其内容的API。QML API包含了高级的API,可以很容易地与Qt的其他部分集成,通过Qt Quick实现方便的动画、效果和UI。如果你需要更多的低级访问,还可以使用C++API。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a request for the status bar functionality occurs in relation to a QMainWindow object. QMainWindow provides a main application window, with a menu bar, tool bars, dock widgets
trans-unit.target: 通常，与QMainWindow对象有关的是对状态栏功能的请求。QMainWindow提供一个主应用程序窗口，带有菜单栏，工具栏，停靠小部件

trans-unit.source: Typically, a resource-definition script (.rc file) is compiled to a Windows resource file. Within the Microsoft toolchain, the RC tool generates a .res file, which can be linked with the Microsoft linker to an EXE or DLL. The MinGW toolchain uses the windres tool to generate an .o file that can be linked with the MinGW linker to an EXE or DLL.
trans-unit.target: 通常，资源定义脚本（.rc文件）被编译为Windows资源文件。在Microsoft工具链中，RC工具生成一个.res文件，该文件可以与Microsoft链接程序链接到EXE或DLL。该MinGW的工具链使用windres工具生成可以与被链接的.o文件将MinGW的链接到一个EXE或DLL。

trans-unit.source: Typography in Qt is done with QTextDocument which uses the QPainter API in combination with Qt's font classes, primarily QFont. Applications that prefer more low-level APIs to text and font handling, classes like QRawFont and QGlyphRun can be used.
trans-unit.target: Qt的排版是通过QTextDocument完成的，QTextDocument将QPainter API与Qt的字体类（主要是QFont）结合使用。倾向于使用更底层API而不是文本和字体处理的应用程序，可以使用QRawFont和QGlyphRun之类的类。

trans-unit.source: UCS-4 is a Unicode codec and therefore it is lossless. All characters from this string will be encoded in UCS-4. Any invalid sequence of code units in this string is replaced by the Unicode replacement character (QChar::ReplacementCharacter, which corresponds to U+FFFD).
trans-unit.target: UCS-4是Unicode编解码器，因此是无损的。该字符串中的所有字符都将以UCS-4编码。此字符串中任何无效的代码单元序列均由Unicode替换字符（QChar :: ReplacementCharacter，它对应于 U+FFFD ）替换。

trans-unit.source: UDP (User Datagram Protocol) is a lightweight, unreliable, datagram-oriented, connectionless protocol. It can be used when reliability isn't important. QUdpSocket is a subclass of QAbstractSocket that allows you to send and receive UDP datagrams.
trans-unit.target: UDP（用户数据报协议）是一种轻量级，不可靠，面向数据报的无连接协议。当可靠性不重要时可以使用它。QUdpSocket是QAbstractSocket的子类，可让您发送和接收UDP数据报。

trans-unit.source: UDP (User Datagram Protocol) is a lightweight, unreliable, datagram-oriented, connectionless protocol. It can be used when reliability isn't important. For example, a server that reports the time of day could choose UDP. If a datagram with the time of day is lost, the client can simply make another request.
trans-unit.target: UDP(用户数据报协议)是一种轻量级的、不可靠的、面向数据报的、无连接的协议。当可靠性不重要时,可以使用它。例如,一个报告一天时间的服务器可以选择UDP。如果丢失了一个包含时间的数据报,客户端只需再提出一个请求即可。

trans-unit.source: UDP (User Datagram Protocol) is a lightweight, unreliable, datagram-oriented, connectionless protocol. It can be used when reliability isn't important. QUdpSocket is a subclass of QAbstractSocket that allows you to send and receive UDP datagrams.
trans-unit.target: UDP（用户数据报协议）是一种轻量级，不可靠，面向数据报的无连接协议。当可靠性不重要时可以使用它。QUdpSocket是QAbstractSocket的子类，它使您可以发送和接收UDP数据报。

trans-unit.source: URLs can be represented in two forms: encoded or unencoded. The unencoded representation is suitable for showing to users, but the encoded representation is typically what you would send to a web server. For example, the unencoded URL "http://bühler.example.com/List of applicants.xml" would be sent to the server as "http://xn--bhler-kva.example.com/List%20of%20applicants.xml".
trans-unit.target: URL可以两种形式表示：已编码或未编码。未编码的表示形式适合显示给用户，但是编码的表示形式通常是您要发送到Web服务器的形式。例如，未编码的URL“ http：//bühler.example.com/lists.xml”将作为“ http://xn--bhler-kva.example.com/List%20of%”发送到服务器。 20applicants.xml”。

trans-unit.source: UTF-8 is a Unicode codec and can represent all characters in a Unicode string like QString.

trans-unit.source: UTF-8 is a Unicode codec and can represent all characters in a Unicode string like QString. However, invalid sequences are possible with UTF-8 and, if any such are found, they will be replaced with one or more "replacement characters", or suppressed. These include non-Unicode sequences, non-characters, overlong sequences or surrogate codepoints encoded into UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: UTF-8是Unicode编解码器，可以表示Unicode字符串（如QString）中的所有字符。但是，UTF-8可能会出现无效序列，如果找到任何无效序列，它们将被一个或多个“替换字符”替换，或被抑制。这些包括非Unicode序列，非字符，超长序列或编码为UTF-8的替代代码点。

trans-unit.source: UWP applications are UI applications by nature. This implies that console type applications will have a window created internally, which is always visible.
trans-unit.target: UWP应用程序本质上是UI应用程序。这意味着控制台类型的应用程序将有一个内部创建的窗口,它总是可见的。

trans-unit.source: UWP applications must be packaged (including all dependencies) and installed or registered with the application service in order to be launched. The WinRT Runner Tool can be used to launch these applications from the command line.
trans-unit.target: UWP应用程序必须打包（包括所有依赖项）并安装或注册到应用程序服务中才能启动。WinRT Runner工具可用于从命令行启动这些应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Undefined values are different from null values. While nulls are used to indicate an optional value that is not provided, Undefined is usually used to indicate that an expected value could not be provided, usually due to an error or a precondition that could not be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 未定义值与空值不同。空值用来表示一个没有提供的可选值,而未定义值通常用来表示不能提供一个预期值,通常是由于一个错误或一个不能满足的前提条件。

trans-unit.source: Undefined values are distinct from null values.

trans-unit.source: Under normal circumstances, there is only one tool tip visible at a time. In order to save resources, all items that use the ToolTip attached property share the same visual tool tip label instance. Even though the visuals are shared, text, timeout and delay are stored individually for each item that uses the respective attached property. However, multiple items cannot make the shared tool tip visible at the same time. The shared tool tip is only shown for the last item that made it visible. The position of the shared tool tip is determined by the framework.
trans-unit.target: 在正常情况下，一次只能看到一个工具提示。为了节省资源，所有使用附加了ToolTip的属性的项目都共享相同的可视化工具提示标签实例。即使共享了视觉效果， text ， timeout 和 delay 也会为使用各自附加属性的每个项目单独存储。但是，多个项目不能使共享工具提示同时可见。共享工具提示仅针对使其可见的最后一项显示。共享工具提示的位置由框架确定。

trans-unit.source: Unicode I/O should be used as this maximizes the portability of documents between users around the world. In many cases it is however still necessary to support other encodings as your users will need to process existing documents. The most important additional encoding to support is the one returned by QTextCodec::codecForLocale(), as this is the one the user is most likely to need for communicating with other people and applications (this is the codec used by local8Bit()).
trans-unit.target: 应该使用Unicode I / O，因为这样可以最大程度地提高世界各地用户之间文档的可移植性。但是，在许多情况下，仍然需要支持其他编码，因为您的用户将需要处理现有文档。支持的最重要的附加编码是QTextCodec :: codecForLocale（）返回的编码，因为这是用户最可能需要与其他人和应用程序进行通信的编码（这是local8Bit（）使用的编码解码器）。

trans-unit.source: Unicode has a certain number of code points that are classified as "non-characters:" that is, they can be used for internal purposes in applications but cannot be used for text interchange. Those are the last two entries each Unicode Plane ([0xfffe..0xffff], [0x1fffe..0x1ffff], etc.) as well as the entries in range [0xfdd0..0xfdef].
trans-unit.target: Unicode有一定数量的码点被归类为 "非字符:"也就是说,它们可以用于应用程序的内部用途,但不能用于文本交换。那是每个Unicode平面的最后两个条目([0xfffe...0xffff]、[0x1fffe...0x1ffff]等)以及范围[0xfdd0...0xfd]的条目。

trans-unit.source: Units of Unicode characters that make up what the user thinks of as a character or basic unit of the language are here called Grapheme clusters. The two unicode characters 'A' + diaeresis do for example form one grapheme cluster as the user thinks of them as one character, yet it is in this case represented by two unicode code points (see http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr29/#Grapheme_Cluster_Boundaries).
trans-unit.target: 组成用户所认为的字符或语言基本单位的Unicode字符单位在这里称为Grapheme群集。例如，当用户将两个Unicode字符“ A” + diaeresis看作一个字符时，它们确实形成一个字素簇，但是在这种情况下，它由两个Unicode代码点表示（请参见http://www.unicode.org/ report / tr29 /＃Grapheme_Cluster_Boundaries）。

trans-unit.source: Units of Unicode characters that make up what the user thinks of as a character or basic unit of the language are here called Grapheme clusters. The two unicode characters 'A' + diaeresis do for example form one grapheme cluster as the user thinks of them as one character, yet it is in this case represented by two unicode code points (see http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr29/#Grapheme_Cluster_Boundaries).
trans-unit.target: 组成用户所认为的字符或语言基本单元的Unicode字符单位在这里称为Grapheme群集。例如，当用户将两个Unicode字符“ A” + diaeresis视为一个音素簇时，它们将其视为一个字符，但是在这种情况下，它由两个Unicode代码点表示（请参见http://www.unicode.org/ report / tr29 /＃Grapheme_Cluster_Boundaries）。

trans-unit.source: Unix file descriptor passing is not available in all D-Bus connections. This feature is present with D-Bus library and bus daemon version 1.4 and upwards on Unix systems. Qt D-Bus automatically enables the feature if such a version was found at compile-time and run-time.

trans-unit.source: Unix: QSharedMemory "owns" the shared memory segment. When the last thread or process that has an instance of QSharedMemory attached to a particular shared memory segment detaches from the segment by destroying its instance of QSharedMemory, the Unix kernel release the shared memory segment. But if that last thread or process crashes without running the QSharedMemory destructor, the shared memory segment survives the crash.
trans-unit.target: Unix：QSharedMemory “拥有”共享内存段。当最后一个具有QSharedMemory实例附加到特定共享内存段的线程或进程通过销毁其QSharedMemory实例而与该段分离时，Unix内核将释放共享内存段。但是，如果最后一个线程或进程在没有运行QSharedMemory析构函数的情况下崩溃，则共享内存段将在崩溃中幸免。

trans-unit.source: Unix: QSharedMemory "owns" the shared memory segment. When the last thread or process that has an instance of QSharedMemory attached to a particular shared memory segment detaches from the segment by destroying its instance of QSharedMemory, the Unix kernel release the shared memory segment. But if that last thread or process crashes without running the QSharedMemory destructor, the shared memory segment survives the crash.
trans-unit.target: Unix.QSharedMemory QSharedMemory "拥有 "共享内存段。当最后一个有QSharedMemory实例的线程或进程通过销毁它的QSharedMemory实例而脱离该段时,Unix内核会释放该共享内存段。但如果最后一个线程或进程在没有运行QSharedMemory破坏器的情况下崩溃,共享内存段就会在崩溃中幸存下来。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Java-style iterators, STL-style iterators point directly at items. The begin() function of a container returns an iterator that points to the first item in the container. The end() function of a container returns an iterator to the imaginary item one position past the last item in the container. end() marks an invalid position; it must never be dereferenced. It is typically used in a loop's break condition. If the list is empty, begin() equals end(), so we never execute the loop.
trans-unit.target: 与Java样式的迭代器不同，STL样式的迭代器直接指向项目。容器的begin（）函数返回一个迭代器，该迭代器指向容器中的第一项。容器的end（）函数将迭代器返回到假想项目，该假想项目位于容器中最后一个项目之后的位置。end（）标记无效位置；绝对不能取消引用。它通常用于循环的中断条件中。如果列表为空，则begin（）等于end（），因此我们从不执行循环。

trans-unit.target: 与QMap通过键对项目进行排序不同，QHash以任意顺序存储其项目。唯一的保证是，共享相同密钥的项（因为它们是使用QMultiHash插入的）将连续显示，从最近到最近插入的值。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QMap, which orders its items by key, QMultiHash stores its items in an arbitrary order.
trans-unit.target: 与QMap通过键对项目进行排序不同，QMultiHash以任意顺序存储其项目。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QMap, which orders its items by key, QMultiHash stores its items in an arbitrary order. The only guarantee is that items that share the same key (because they were inserted using a QMultiHash) will appear consecutively, from the most recently to the least recently inserted value.
trans-unit.target: 与QMap通过键对项目进行排序不同，QMultiHash以任意顺序存储其项目。唯一的保证是，共享相同密钥的项（因为它们是使用QMultiHash插入的）将连续显示，从最近到最近插入的值。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QMetaProperty which represents a property on a class type, QQmlProperty encapsulates a property on a specific object instance. To read a property's value, programmers create a QQmlProperty instance and call the read() method. Likewise to write a property value the write() method is used.
trans-unit.target: 与QMetaProperty代表类类型的属性不同，QQmlProperty封装特定对象实例上的属性。要读取属性的值，程序员创建一个QQmlProperty实例并调用read（）方法。同样地，使用write（）方法写入属性值。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QMetaProperty which represents a property on a class type, QQmlProperty encapsulates a property on a specific object instance. To read a property's value, programmers create a QQmlProperty instance and call the read() method. Likewise to write a property value the write() method is used.
trans-unit.target: 与QMetaProperty代表类类型的属性不同，QQmlProperty封装特定对象实例上的属性。为了读取属性的值，程序员创建一个QQmlProperty实例并调用read（）方法。同样地，使用write（）方法写入属性值。

trans-unit.source: Unlike destroy(), this function only invokes the type's destructor, it doesn't invoke the delete operator.
trans-unit.target: 与destroy（）不同，此函数仅调用类型的析构函数，而不调用delete运算符。

trans-unit.source: Unlike sourceCode, this property allows referring to user scripts that are not already loaded in memory, for instance, when stored on disk.
trans-unit.target: 与sourceCode不同，此属性允许引用尚未存储在内存中的用户脚本（例如，存储在磁盘上的用户脚本）。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QMultiHash, which stores its items in an arbitrary order, QMultiMap stores its items ordered by key. Items that share the same key will appear consecutively, from the most recently to the least recently inserted value.
trans-unit.target: 与QMultiHash不同，QMultiHash以任意顺序存储其项目，而QMultiMap按密钥存储其项目。共享同一密钥的项目将从最近插入的值到最近插入的值连续显示。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QMultiMap, QMultiHash does not provide and ordering of the inserted items. The only guarantee is that items that share the same key will appear consecutively, from the most recently to the least recently inserted value.
trans-unit.target: 与QMultiMap不同，QMultiHash不提供插入项的顺序。唯一的保证是，共享同一密钥的项目将从最近到最近插入的值连续显示。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QQuickView, QQmlApplicationEngine does not automatically create a root window. If you are using visual items from Qt Quick, you will need to place them inside of a Window.
trans-unit.target: 与QQuickView不同，QQmlApplicationEngine不会自动创建根窗口。如果您使用的是Qt Quick中的可视项，则需要将其放置在Window内。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QQuickView, QQmlApplicationEngine does not automatically create a root window. If you are using visual items from Qt Quick, you will need to place them inside of a Window.
trans-unit.target: 与QQuickView不同，QQmlApplicationEngine不会自动创建根窗口。如果您使用的是Qt Quick中的可视项，则需要将其放置在Window内。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QQuickView, QQmlApplicationEngine does not automatically create a root window. If you are using visual items from Qt Quick, you will need to place them inside of a Window.
trans-unit.target: 与QQuickView不同，QQmlApplicationEngine不会自动创建根窗口。如果您使用的是Qt Quick中的可视项，则需要将其放置在Window内。

trans-unit.source: Unlike sourceCode, this property allows referring to user scripts that are not already loaded in memory, for instance, when stored on disk.
trans-unit.target: 与sourceCode不同，此属性允许引用尚未存储在内存中的用户脚本（例如，存储在磁盘上的用户脚本）。

trans-unit.source: Unlike setSceneGraphBackend(), which can only be used to request a given backend (shipped either built-in or installed as dynamically loaded plugins), this function works with the higher level concept of graphics APIs. It covers the backends that ship with Qt Quick, and thus have corresponding values in the QSGRendererInterface::GraphicsApi enum.
trans-unit.target: 与setSceneGraphBackend（）不同，后者只能用于请求给定的后端（内置或作为动态加载的插件安装），该函数与图形API的更高层次的概念一起使用。它涵盖了Qt Quick附带的后端，因此在QSGRendererInterface :: GraphicsApi枚举中具有相应的值。

trans-unit.source: Unlike remove(), this function never causes QSet to rehash its internal data structure. This means that it can safely be called while iterating, and won't affect the order of items in the set.
trans-unit.target: 与remove（）不同，此函数从不导致QSet重新哈希其内部数据结构。这意味着可以在迭代时安全地调用它，并且不会影响集合中项目的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QSGMaterialShader, directly issuing state change commands with the underlying graphics API is not possible with QSGMaterialRhiShader. This is mainly because the concept of individually changeable states is considered deprecated and not supported with modern graphics APIs.
trans-unit.target: 不像QSGMaterialShader，直接发出状态改变的命令与底层图形API是不可能的QSGMaterialRhiShader。这主要是因为认为可单独更改状态的概念已被弃用，现代图形API不支持这种状态。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QSGMaterialShader, directly issuing state change commands with the underlying graphics API is not possible with QSGMaterialShader. This is mainly because the concept of individually changeable states is considered deprecated and not supported with modern graphics APIs.
trans-unit.target: 不像QSGMaterialShader，直接发出状态改变的命令与底层图形API是不可能的QSGMaterialShader。这主要是因为认为可单独更改状态的概念已被弃用，现代图形API不支持这种状态。

trans-unit.source: Unlike render(), this function is called before the scenegraph starts recording the render pass for the current frame on the underlying command buffer. This is useful when doing rendering with graphics APIs, such as Vulkan, where copy type of operations will need to be recorded before the render pass.
trans-unit.target: 与render（）不同，此函数在场景图开始在基础命令缓冲区上记录当前帧的渲染过程之前被调用。当使用图形API（例如Vulkan）进行渲染时，这很有用，因为在其中需要在渲染传递之前记录操作的复制类型。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QSslConfiguration::setLocalCertificate() this method allows you to specify any intermediate certificates required in order to validate your certificate. The first item in the list must be the leaf certificate.
trans-unit.target: 与QSslConfiguration :: setLocalCertificate（）不同，此方法允许您指定为了验证证书所需的任何中间证书。列表中的第一项必须是叶子证书。

trans-unit.source: Unlike constData() and unicode(), the returned data is always '\0'-terminated.
trans-unit.target: 与constData（）和unicode（）不同，返回的数据始终以'\ 0'结尾。

trans-unit.target: 与resize（int）不同，此重载将新字符初始化为

trans-unit.target: 与QString :: simplified（）不同，trimmed（）仅保留内部空格。

trans-unit.source: Unlike simplified(), trimmed() leaves internal whitespace alone.
trans-unit.target: 与简化（）不同，trimmed（）保留内部空白。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QString::toDouble(), this function does not fall back to the "C" locale if the string cannot be interpreted in this locale.
trans-unit.target: 与QString :: toDouble（）不同，如果无法在此语言环境中解释字符串，则此函数不会退回到“ C”语言环境。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QStringView and QUtf8StringView, QAnyStringView can hold strings of any of the following encodings: UTF-8, UTF-16, and Latin-1. The latter is supported to keep old source working efficiently. It is expected that by Qt 7, the Latin-1 support will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 与QStringView和QUtf8StringView不同，QAnyStringView可以保存以下任何编码的字符串：UTF-8，UTF-16和Latin-1。支持后者以保持旧源有效地工作。预计到Qt 7时，将删除Latin-1支持。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Qt Widgets, Qt Quick Controls 1 do not use the native action bar on Android. ToolBar and MenuBar are offered as a cross-platform replacement. They are unified to a single "action bar" when assigned to the appropriate ApplicationWindow properties.
trans-unit.target: 与Qt Widgets不同，Qt Quick Controls 1在Android上不使用本机操作栏。ToolBar和MenuBar作为跨平台替代产品提供。将它们分配给适当的ApplicationWindow属性后，它们会统一为一个“操作栏” 。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QWidget, QGraphicsScene does not have the convenience functions enterEvent() and leaveEvent(). Use this function to obtain those events instead.
trans-unit.target: 与QWidget不同，QGraphicsScene不具有便捷功能enterEvent（）和LeaveEvent（）。使用此函数来获取那些事件。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QWindow, QOpenGLWindow allows opening a painter on itself and perform QPainter-based drawing.
trans-unit.target: 与QWindow不同，QOpenGLWindow允许自己打开一个画家并执行基于QPainter的绘制。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QWindow, QOpenGLWindow allows opening a painter on itself and perform QPainter-based drawing.
trans-unit.target: 与QWindow不同，QOpenGLWindow允许自己打开一个画家并执行基于QPainter的绘制。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QWidget, QGraphicsScene does not have the convenience functions enterEvent() and leaveEvent(). Use this function to obtain those events instead.
trans-unit.target: 与QWidget不同，QGraphicsScene没有便利函数enterEvent（）和LeaveEvent（）。使用此函数来获取那些事件。

trans-unit.source: Unlike software or d3d12, the RHI-based renderer is not an additional adaptation, and is always built-in. As of Qt 5.14 it can be enabled by setting the environment variable QSG_RHI to a non-zero value before starting the application, or via QQuickWindow::setSceneGraphBackend() in combination with QSGRendererInterface::GraphicsApi. When none of this is done, OpenGL is used directly like in previous versions.
trans-unit.target: 与 software 或 d3d12 不同，基于RHI的渲染器不是附加的改编，而是始终内置的。从Qt 5.14开始，可以通过在启动应用程序之前将环境变量 QSG_RHI 设置为非零值，或通过QQuickWindow :: setSceneGraphBackend（）与QSGRendererInterface :: GraphicsApi结合使用来启用它。如果不执行任何操作，则像以前的版本一样直接使用OpenGL。

trans-unit.source: Unlike software, the RHI-based renderer is not an additional adaptation, and is always built-in. As of Qt 6.0 it is always enabled. On platforms where multiple graphics APIs are available, the scenegraph makes a platform-specific choice. If this is not desired, applications can force a specified graphics API by setting the environment variable QSG_RHI_BACKEND or via QQuickWindow::setGraphicsApi() in combination with QSGRendererInterface::GraphicsApi.
trans-unit.target: 与 software 不同，基于RHI的渲染器不是附加的改编，并且始终是内置的。从Qt 6.0开始，它始终处于启用状态。在可以使用多个图形API的平台上，场景图形会做出特定于平台的选择。如果不希望这样做，则应用程序可以通过设置环境变量 QSG_RHI_BACKEND 或通过QQuickWindow :: setGraphicsApi（）结合QSGRendererInterface :: GraphicsApi来强制使用指定的图形API 。

trans-unit.source: Unlike stop(), complete() immediately fast-forwards the animation to its end. In the following example,
trans-unit.target: 与 stop() 不同， complete() 立即将动画快速结束。在以下示例中，

trans-unit.source: Unlike GLSL's attributes, no names are used for vertex input elements. Therefore qt_Vertex and qt_MultiTexCoord0 are not relevant. Instead, the standard Direct3D semantics, POSITION and TEXCOORD (or TEXCOORD0) are used for identifying the correct input layout.
trans-unit.target: 与GLSL的属性不同，顶点输入元素不使用任何名称。因此，qt_Vertex和qt_MultiTexCoord0不相关。而是使用标准Direct3D语义 POSITION 和 TEXCOORD （或 TEXCOORD0 ）来标识正确的输入布局。

trans-unit.source: Unlike GLSL's samplers, texture and sampler objects are separate in HLSL. Shaders are expected to expect 2D, non-array, non-multisample textures. Both the texture and sampler binding points are expected to be sequential and start from 0 (meaning registers t0, t1, ..., and s0, s1, ..., respectively). Unlike with OpenGL, samplers are not mapped to Qt Quick item properties and therefore the name of the sampler is not relevant. Instead, it is the textures that map to properties referencing Image or ShaderEffectSource items.
trans-unit.target: 与GLSL的采样器不同，纹理和采样器对象在HLSL中是分开的。着色器有望获得2D，非阵列，非多样本纹理。纹理和采样器绑定点都应该是顺序的，并且从0开始（分别意味着寄存器 t0, t1, ... 和 s0, s1, ... ）。与OpenGL不同，采样器不会映射到Qt Quick项目属性，因此采样器的名称不相关。而是，纹理映射到引用Image或ShaderEffectSource项的属性。

trans-unit.source: Unlike JSON and QVariantMap, CBOR map keys can be of any type, not just strings. For that reason, QCborMap is effectively a map between QCborValue keys to QCborValue value elements.
trans-unit.target: 与JSON和QVariantMap不同，CBOR映射键可以是任何类型，而不仅仅是字符串。因此，QCborMap实际上是QCborValue键与QCborValue值元素之间的映射。

trans-unit.source: Unlike JSON and QVariantMap, CBOR map keys can be of any type, not just strings. For that reason, QCborMap is effectively a map between QCborValue keys to QCborValue value elements.
trans-unit.target: 与JSON和QVariantMap不同，CBOR映射键可以是任何类型，而不仅仅是字符串。因此，QCborMap实际上是QCborValue键与QCborValue值元素之间的映射。

trans-unit.source: Unlike OpenGL, backends for modern APIs will typically prefer offline compilation and shipping pre-compiled bytecode with applications instead of inlined shader source strings. In this case the string properties for vertex and fragment shaders are treated as URLs referring to local files or files shipped via the Qt resource system.
trans-unit.target: 与OpenGL不同的是,现代API的后端通常更倾向于离线编译,并将预编译的字节码与应用程序一起发布,而不是内嵌着色器源码字符串。在这种情况下,顶点和片段着色器的字符串属性被视为指向本地文件或通过Qt资源系统运送的文件的URL。

trans-unit.source: Unlike OpenGL, the Direct3D backend is able to perform runtime shader compilation on dedicated threads. This is managed transparently to the applications, and means that ShaderEffect items that contain HLSL source strings do not block the rendering or other parts of the application until the bytecode is ready.
trans-unit.target: 与OpenGL不同，Direct3D后端能够在专用线程上执行运行时着色器编译。这对于应用程序是透明管理的，这意味着包含HLSL源字符串的ShaderEffect项在字节码准备好之前不会阻止应用程序的呈现或其他部分。

trans-unit.source: Unlike OpenGL, the Direct3D backend is able to perform runtime shader compilation on dedicated threads. This is managed transparently to the applications, and means that ShaderEffect items that contain HLSL source strings do not block the rendering or other parts of the application until the bytecode is ready.
trans-unit.target: 与OpenGL不同,Direct3D后端能够在专用线程上执行运行时着色器编译。这对应用程序来说是透明管理的,这意味着包含HLSL源码字符串的ShaderEffect项目在字节码准备好之前不会阻止应用程序的渲染或其他部分。

trans-unit.source: Unlike OpenGL, whenever you open a file, there is a QFileSelector with the extra hlsl selector used. This provides easy creation of ShaderEffect items that are functional across both backends, for example by placing the GLSL source code into shaders/effect.frag, the HLSL source code or - preferably - pre-compiled bytecode into shaders/+hlsl/effect.frag, while simply writing fragmentShader: "qrc:shaders/effect.frag" in QML. For more details, see ShaderEffect.
trans-unit.target: 与OpenGL不同，无论何时打开文件，都会有一个使用了额外的 hlsl 选择器的QFileSelector。这样可以轻松创建在两个后端都可以使用的ShaderEffect项，例如，将GLSL源代码放入 shaders/effect.frag ，HLSL源代码，或者-最好将预编译的字节码放入 shaders/+hlsl/effect.frag ，而只需在QML中编写 fragmentShader: "qrc:shaders/effect.frag" 。有关更多详细信息，请参见ShaderEffect。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QBENCHMARK, the contents of the contained code block is only run once. The elapsed time will be reported as "0" if it's to short to be measured by the selected backend. (Use)
trans-unit.target: 与QBENCHMARK不同的是,所包含的代码块的内容只运行一次。如果时间太短,不能被选定的后端测量,那么经过的时间将被报告为 "0"。(使用)

trans-unit.source: Unlike QDirModel, QFileSystemModel uses a separate thread to populate itself so it will not cause the main thread to hang as the file system is being queried. Calls to rowCount() will return 0 until the model populates a directory.
trans-unit.target: 与QDirModel不同，QFileSystemModel使用一个单独的线程来填充自身，因此不会在查询文件系统时导致主线程挂起。调用rowCount（）将返回0，直到模型填充目录为止。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QDirModel, QFileSystemModel uses a separate thread to populate itself so it will not cause the main thread to hang as the file system is being queried. Calls to rowCount() will return 0 until the model populates a directory.
trans-unit.target: 与QDirModel不同，QFileSystemModel使用一个单独的线程来填充自身，因此不会在查询文件系统时导致主线程挂起。对rowCount（）的调用将返回0，直到模型填充目录为止。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QGLWidget, triggering a buffer swap just for the QOpenGLWidget is not possible since there is no real, onscreen native surface for it. Instead, it is up to the widget stack to manage composition and buffer swaps on the gui thread. When a thread is done updating the framebuffer, call update() on the GUI/main thread to schedule composition.
trans-unit.target: 与QGLWidget不同，不可能仅为QOpenGLWidget触发缓冲区交换，因为没有真正的屏幕本机表面。取而代之的是，由小部件堆栈来管理gui线程上的组​​合和缓冲区交换。当线程完成了对帧缓冲区的更新后，请在GUI /主线程上调用update（）以安排合成。

trans-unit.source: Unlike QGLWidget, triggering a buffer swap just for the QOpenGLWidget is not possible since there is no real, onscreen native surface for it. Instead, it is up to the widget stack to manage composition and buffer swaps on the gui thread. When a thread is done updating the framebuffer, call update() on the GUI/main thread to schedule composition.
trans-unit.target: 与QGLWidget不同，不可能仅为QOpenGLWidget触发缓冲区交换，因为它没有真正的屏幕本机表面。取而代之的是，由小部件堆栈来管理gui线程上的组​​合和缓冲区交换。当线程完成了对帧缓冲区的更新后，请在GUI /主线程上调用update（）以安排合成。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Qt's container iterators, QDirIterator is uni-directional (i.e., you cannot iterate directories in reverse order) and does not allow random access.
trans-unit.target: 与Qt的容器迭代器不同，QDirIterator是单向的（即，您不能以相反的顺序迭代目录），并且不允许随机访问。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Qt's container iterators, QDirIterator is uni-directional (i.e., you cannot iterate directories in reverse order) and does not allow random access.
trans-unit.target: 与Qt的容器迭代器不同的是,QDirIterator是单向的(即不能按反向顺序迭代目录),不允许随机访问。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a view, QModelRoleDataSpan is a span, so it allows for modifications to the underlying elements.
trans-unit.target: 与视图不同,QModelRoleDataSpan是一个跨度,所以它允许对底层元素进行修改。

trans-unit.source: Unlike an ordinary property, an alias has the following restrictions:
trans-unit.target: 与普通财产不同,别名有以下限制:

trans-unit.source: Unlike createTextureFromId(), this function supports both direct OpenGL usage and the RHI abstracted rendering path.
trans-unit.target: 与createTextureFromId()不同的是,这个函数既支持OpenGL的直接使用,也支持RHI的抽象渲染路径。

trans-unit.source: Unlike custom materials, effects support multiple passes. For many effects this it not necessary, and when there is a need to apply multiple effects, identical results can often be achieved by chaining together multiple effects in the SceneEnvironment. This is demonstrated by the Custom Effect example as well. However, passes have the possibility to request additional color buffers (texture), and specify which of these additional buffers they output to. This allows implementing more complex image processing techniques since subsequent passes can then use one or more of these additional buffers, plus the original scene's content, as their input. If necessary, these additional buffers can have an extended lifetime, meaning their content is preserved between frames, which allows implementing effects that rely on accumulating content from multiple frames, such as, motion blur.
trans-unit.target: 与自定义材质不同，效果支持多次通过。对于许多效果而言，这不是必需的，并且当需要应用多种效果时，通常可以通过将SceneEnvironment中的多种效果链接在一起来获得相同的结果。自定义效果示例对此进行了演示也一样 但是，通过可能会请求其他颜色缓冲区（纹理），并指定将其输出到这些其他颜色缓冲区中的哪个。这允许实现更复杂的图像处理技术，因为随后的遍历可以使用这些附加缓冲区中的一个或多个以及原始场景的内容作为输入。如有必要，这些额外的缓冲区可以具有更长的寿命，这意味着它们的内容可以在帧之间保留，从而可以实现依赖于从多个帧中累积内容的效果，例如运动模糊。

trans-unit.source: Unlike destroy(), this function only invokes the type's destructor, it doesn't invoke the delete operator.
trans-unit.target: 与destroy()不同的是,这个函数只调用了类型的destructor,并没有调用delete操作符。

trans-unit.source: Unlike for Qt itself, building applications with qmake is still supported in Qt 6.0, as long as a suitable device spec is available, and the appropriate legacy arguments were passed to CMake or configure when configuring Qt. If this is all true, then running qmake and make will also generate an application binary for the target device.
trans-unit.target: 与Qt本身不同，只要有合适的设备规格可用，并且在配置Qt时将适当的旧式参数传递给CMake或配置，Qt 6.0仍支持使用qmake构建应用程序。如果全部正确，则运行 qmake 和 make 还将为目标设备生成一个应用程序二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: Unlike hue and saturation properties, lightness does not set the used value, but it shifts the existing source pixel lightness value.
trans-unit.target: 与色调和饱和度属性不同的是,明度并不设置使用值,而是将现有的源像素明度值转移。

trans-unit.source: Unlike its macOS counterpart, only numbers can be used.
trans-unit.target: 与macOS版本不同，只能使用数字。

trans-unit.source: Unlike its macOS counterpart, only numbers can be used.
trans-unit.target: 与macOS对应的不同,只能使用数字。

trans-unit.source: Unlike move assignment, neither of the two objects ever releases its semaphore, if any, as a consequence of swapping.
trans-unit.target: 与移动赋值不同,两个对象都不会因为交换而释放它的旗语(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: Unlike multiple inheritance, adaptors can be added at any time to any object (but not removed), which allows for greater flexibility when exporting existing classes. Another advantage of adaptors is to provide similar but not identical functionality in methods of the same name in different interfaces, a case which can be quite common when adding a new version of a standard interface to an object.
trans-unit.target: 与多重继承不同的是,适配器可以在任何时候添加到任何对象中(但不能删除),这使得在导出现有类时有更大的灵活性。适配器的另一个优点是在不同接口中的同名方法中提供相似但不完全相同的功能,这种情况在向对象添加一个新版本的标准接口时可能相当常见。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other QIODevice implementations, such as QTcpSocket, QFile does not emit the aboutToClose(), bytesWritten(), or readyRead() signals. This implementation detail means that QFile is not suitable for reading and writing certain types of files, such as device files on Unix platforms.
trans-unit.target: 与其他QIODevice实现不同，例如QTcpSocket，QFile不会发出aboutToClose（），bytesWritten（）或readyRead（）信号。此实现细节表示QFile不适合读写某些类型的文件，例如Unix平台上的设备文件。

This implementation detail means that QFile is not suitable for reading and writing certain types of files, such as device files on Unix platforms.
trans-unit.target: 与其他QIODevice实现不同，例如QTcpSocket，QFile不会发出aboutToClose（），bytesWritten（）或readyRead（）信号。此实现细节意味着QFile不适合读写某些类型的文件，例如Unix平台上的设备文件。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other Qt classes, QStringView uses qsizetype as its size_type, to allow accepting data from std::basic_string without truncation. The Qt API functions, for example length(), return int, while the STL-compatible functions, for example size(), return size_type.
trans-unit.target: 与其他Qt类不同，QStringView使用qsizetype作为其 size_type ，以允许其从 std::basic_string 接收数据而不会被截断。Qt API函数（例如length（））返回 int ，而与STL兼容的函数（例如size（））返回 size_type 。

trans-unit.source: Unlike plain C++ arrays, QLists can be resized at any time by calling resize(). If the new size is larger than the old size, QList might need to reallocate the whole list. QList tries to reduce the number of reallocations by preallocating up to twice as much memory as the actual data needs.
trans-unit.target: 与普通C ++数组不同，可以通过调用resize（）随时调整QList的大小。如果新大小大于旧大小，则QList可能需要重新分配整个列表。QList尝试通过预分配多达实际数据需求两倍的内存来减少重新分配的数量。

trans-unit.source: Unlike plain C++ arrays, QVectors can be resized at any time by calling resize(). If the new size is larger than the old size, QVector might need to reallocate the whole vector. QVector tries to reduce the number of reallocations by preallocating up to twice as much memory as the actual data needs.
trans-unit.target: 与普通的C ++数组不同，可以通过调用resize（）随时调整QVectors的大小。如果新大小大于旧大小，则QVector可能需要重新分配整个向量。QVector试图通过预分配多达实际数据需求两倍的内存来减少重新分配的次数。

trans-unit.source: Unlike plain C++ arrays, QVectors can be resized at any time by calling resize(). If the new size is larger than the old size, QVector might need to reallocate the whole vector. QVector tries to reduce the number of reallocations by preallocating up to twice as much memory as the actual data needs.
trans-unit.target: 与普通C ++数组不同，可以通过调用resize（）随时调整QVectors的大小。如果新大小大于旧大小，则QVector可能需要重新分配整个向量。QVector试图通过预分配多达实际数据需求两倍的内存来减少重新分配的次数。

trans-unit.source: Unlike queued slots or invoked methods, methods called directly on the QThread object will execute in the thread that calls the method. When subclassing QThread, keep in mind that the constructor executes in the old thread while run() executes in the new thread. If a member variable is accessed from both functions, then the variable is accessed from two different threads. Check that it is safe to do so.
trans-unit.target: 与排队的插槽或调用的方法不同，直接在QThread对象上调用的方法将在调用该方法的线程中执行。子类化QThread时，请记住，构造函数在旧线程中执行，而run（）在新线程中执行。如果从两个函数访问成员变量，则将从两个不同的线程访问该变量。检查这样做是否安全。

trans-unit.source: Unlike queued slots or invoked methods, methods called directly on the QThread object will execute in the thread that calls the method. When subclassing QThread, keep in mind that the constructor executes in the old thread while run() executes in the new thread. If a member variable is accessed from both functions, then the variable is accessed from two different threads. Check that it is safe to do so.
trans-unit.target: 与排队的插槽或调用的方法不同，直接在QThread对象上调用的方法将在调用该方法的线程中执行。子类化QThread时，请记住，构造函数在旧线程中执行，而run（）在新线程中执行。如果从两个函数访问成员变量，则将从两个不同的线程访问该变量。检查这样做是否安全。

trans-unit.source: Unlike signals, method parameter types do not have to be declared as they default to the var type.
trans-unit.target: 与信号不同，方法参数类型不必声明，因为它们默认为 var 类型。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the 2D scene graph in Qt Quick, the spatial scene graph exposes resource nodes to the user directly. So for example in Qt Quick, while QSGTexture is public API, there is no QQuickItem that exposes this object directly. Instead the user must either use an Image item, which describes both where the texture comes from as well as how to render it, or write C++ code to operate on the QSGTexture itself. In Qt Quick 3D these resources are exposed directly in the QML API. This is necessary because resources are an important part of the scene state. These resources can be referenced by many objects in the scene: for example, many Materials could use the same Texture. It is also possible to set properties of a Texture at runtime that would directly change how a texture is sampled, for example.
trans-unit.target: 与Qt Quick中的2D场景图不同，空间场景图将资源节点直接暴露给用户。因此，例如在Qt Quick中，虽然QSGTexture是公共API，但是没有QQuickItem直接暴露此对象。相反，用户必须使用Image项目（描述纹理的来源以及如何渲染），或者编写C ++代码以在QSGTexture上进行操作本身。在Qt Quick 3D中，这些资源直接在QML API中公开。这是必需的，因为资源是场景状态的重要部分。这些资源可以被场景中的许多对象引用：例如，许多材质可以使用相同的纹理。例如，还可以在运行时设置Texture的属性，这些属性将直接更改采样纹理的方式。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::finished() signal this signal will even be emitted when an error occurred during the service discovery. Therefore it is recommended to check the error() signal to evaluate the success of the service discovery discovery.
trans-unit.target: 与QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent :: finished（）信号不同，在服务发现期间发生错误时，甚至会发出此信号。因此，建议检查error（）信号以评估服务发现发现是否成功。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the QByteArray overload of append(), this function is not limited by QByteArray's size limits. However, note that neither QCborStreamReader::readByteArray() nor QCborValue support reading CBOR streams with byte arrays larger than 2 GB.
trans-unit.target: 与append（）的QByteArray重载不同，此函数不受QByteArray的大小限制的限制。但是，请注意，QCborStreamReader :: readByteArray（）和QCborValue均不支持读取字节数组大于2 GB的CBOR流。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the fromRgb() function, the alpha-channel specified by the given QRgb value is included.
trans-unit.target: 与fromRgb（）函数不同，它包含了由给定QRgb值指定的alpha通道。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the QLatin1String overload of append(), this function is not limited to 2 GB. However, note that neither QCborStreamReader nor QCborValue support reading CBOR streams with text strings larger than 2 GB.
trans-unit.target: 与append（）的QLatin1String重载不同，此函数不限于2 GB。但是，请注意，QCborStreamReader和QCborValue都不支持读取文本字符串大于2 GB的CBOR流。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the QLatin1String overload of append(), this function is not limited to 2 GB. However, note that neither QCborStreamReader::readString() nor QCborValue support reading CBOR streams with text strings larger than 2 GB.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the QLatin1String overload of append(), this function is not limited to 2 GB. However, note that neither QCborStreamReader nor QCborValue support reading CBOR streams with text strings larger than 2 GB.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the uiLanguages() the returned value of the bcp47Name() represents the locale name of the QLocale data but not the language the user-interface should be in.
trans-unit.target: 与uiLanguages（）不同，返回的bcp47Name（）值表示QLocale数据的语言环境名称，而不是用户界面应使用的语言。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the color property, the currentColor property is updated while the user is selecting colors in the dialog, even before the final selection has been made.
trans-unit.target: 与color属性不同，即使在进行最终选择之前，用户在对话框中选择颜色时， currentColor 属性也会更新。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the currentColor property, the color property is not updated while the user is selecting colors in the dialog, but only after the final selection has been made. That is, when the user has clicked OK to accept a color. Alternatively, the accepted() signal can be handled to get the final selection.
trans-unit.target: 与currentColor属性不同，在用户在对话框中选择颜色时，不会更新 color 属性，而只会在最终选择之后更新。也就是说，当用户单击“ 确定”以接受颜色时。或者，可以处理accepted（）信号以获得最终选择。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the width and height properties, which scale the painting of the image, this property sets the actual number of pixels stored for the loaded image so that large images do not use more memory than necessary. For example, this ensures the image in memory is no larger than 1024x1024 pixels, regardless of the Image's width and height values:
trans-unit.target: 与width和height属性不同，该属性缩放图像的绘制，此属性设置为加载的图像存储的实际像素数，这样，大图像就不会使用比必要更多的内存。例如，这可以确保内存中的图像不大于1024x1024像素，而不管图像的宽度和高度值如何：

trans-unit.source: Unlike the width and height properties, which scale the painting of the image, this property sets the maximum number of pixels stored for the loaded image so that large images do not use more memory than necessary. For example, this ensures the image in memory is no larger than 1024x1024 pixels, regardless of the Image's width and height values:
trans-unit.target: 与width和height属性不同，该属性缩放图像的绘制，此属性设置为加载的图像存储的最大像素数，这样，大图像就不会使用比必要的更多的内存。例如，这可以确保内存中的图像不大于1024x1024像素，而不管图像的宽度和高度值如何：

trans-unit.source: Unlike the C++ item views such as QListView or QTableView, the setData() method must be explicitly invoked from QML delegates whenever appropriate. This is done by simply assigning a new value to the corresponding model property.
trans-unit.target: 不同于C ++项目视图诸如而QListView或QTableView中，在 setData() 方法，必须明确地由QML代表调用任何适当的时候。只需将新值分配给相应的模型属性即可完成。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the Model-View-Controller pattern, the model/view design does not include a completely separate component for managing interaction with the user. Generally, the view is responsible for the presentation of model data to the user, and for processing user input. To allow some flexibility in the way this input is obtained, the interaction is performed by delegates. These components provide input capabilities and are also responsible for rendering individual items in some views. The standard interface for controlling delegates is defined in the QAbstractItemDelegate class.
trans-unit.target: 与“模型-视图-控制器”模式不同，模型/视图设计不包括用于管理与用户交互的完全独立的组件。通常，视图负责向用户呈现模型数据，并负责处理用户输入。为了使获取此输入的方式具有一定的灵活性，交互由委托执行。这些组件提供输入功能，还负责在某些视图中渲染单个项目。在QAbstractItemDelegate类中定义了用于控制委托的标准接口。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the default OpenGL Renderer, there is no built-in support to acquire an OpenVG context. This means that the renderer is responsible for requesting and managing the the current context. To do this, you use EGL directly in the OpenVG renderer. Consequently, the OpenVG renderer can only be used with platform plugins that support creating QWindows with support for QSurfaceFormat::OpenVG. From this window, the renderer can get an EGLSurface which can then be used with an EGLContext to render OpenVG content.
trans-unit.target: 与默认的OpenGL Renderer不同，它没有内置支持来获取OpenVG上下文。这意味着渲染器负责请求和管理当前上下文。为此，您可以在OpenVG渲染器中直接使用EGL 。因此，OpenVG渲染器只能与支持创建QWindows且支持QSurfaceFormat :: OpenVG的平台插件一起使用。从此窗口，渲染器可以获得EGLSurface，然后可以将其与EGLContext一起使用以渲染OpenVG内容。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the default delegate, QSqlRelationalDelegate provides a combobox for fields that are foreign keys into other tables. To use the class, simply call QAbstractItemView::setItemDelegate() on the view with an instance of QSqlRelationalDelegate:
trans-unit.target: 与默认委托不同，QSqlRelationalDelegate为作为其他表外键的字段提供了一个组合框。要使用该类，只需使用QSqlRelationalDelegate的实例在视图上调用QAbstractItemView :: setItemDelegate（）：

trans-unit.source: Unlike the earlier OpenGL-only world of Qt 5, rendering with other graphics APIs requires more well-defined points of starting and ending a frame. When manually driving the rendering loop via QQuickRenderControl, it now falls to the user of QQuickRenderControl to specify these points.
trans-unit.target: 与早期的仅OpenGL的Qt 5世界不同，使用其他图形API进行渲染需要更多明确定义的开始和结束帧的点。当通过手动驱动渲染循环QQuickRenderControl，现在下降到用户QQuickRenderControl指定这些点。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other overload, this function can be used to perform perspective transformations on images.
trans-unit.target: 与其他重载不同的是,这个函数可以用来对图像进行透视变换。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other overload, this function creates transformation matrices that can be used to perform perspective transformations on images.
trans-unit.target: 与其他重载不同的是,这个函数可以创建变换矩阵,用于对图像进行透视变换。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other similar signals, this one is emitted on the GUI thread instead of the render thread. It can be used to synchronize external animation systems with the QML content. At the same time this means that this signal is not suitable for triggering graphics operations.
trans-unit.target: 与其他类似的信号不同,这个信号是在GUI线程上发出的,而不是在渲染线程上发出的。它可以用来同步外部动画系统与QML内容。同时这也意味着这个信号不适合用于触发图形操作。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other similar signals, this one is emitted on the gui thread instead of the render thread. It can be used to synchronize external animation systems with the QML content.
trans-unit.target: 与其他类似的信号不同,这个信号是在gui线程而不是渲染线程上发出的。它可以用来同步外部动画系统和QML内容。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other similar signals, this one is emitted on the gui thread instead of the render thread. It can be used to synchronize external animation systems with the QML content. At the same time this means that this signal is not suitable for triggering graphics operations.
trans-unit.target: 与其他类似的信号不同,这个信号是在gui线程而不是渲染线程上发出的。它可以用来同步外部动画系统与QML内容。同时这也意味着这个信号不适合用于触发图形操作。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the similar QImage constructor that takes a non-const data buffer, this version will never alter the contents of the buffer. For example, calling QImage::bits() will return a deep copy of the image, rather than the buffer passed to the constructor. This allows for the efficiency of constructing a QImage from raw data, without the possibility of the raw data being changed.
trans-unit.target: 与采用非常量数据缓冲区的类似QImage构造函数不同，此版本永远不会更改缓冲区的内容。例如，调用QImage :: bits（）将返回图像的深层副本，而不是传递给构造函数的缓冲区。这允许从原始数据构造QImage的效率，而不必更改原始数据。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the similar QImage constructor that takes a non-const data buffer, this version will never alter the contents of the buffer. For example, calling QImage::bits() will return a deep copy of the image, rather than the buffer passed to the constructor. This allows for the efficiency of constructing a QImage from raw data, without the possibility of the raw data being changed.
trans-unit.target: 与采用非常量数据缓冲区的类似QImage构造函数不同，此版本永远不会更改缓冲区的内容。例如，调用QImage :: bits（）将返回图像的深层副本，而不是传递给构造函数的缓冲区。这允许从原始数据构造QImage的效率，而不必更改原始数据。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the slider, QDial attempts to draw a "nice" number of notches rather than one per line step. If possible, the number of notches drawn is one per line step, but if there aren't enough pixels to draw every one, QDial will skip notches to try and draw a uniform set (e.g. by drawing every second or third notch).
trans-unit.target: 与滑块不同，QDial尝试绘制“不错”的槽口，而不是每行步长一个。如果可能的话，每行步长绘制的凹口数量为一个，但是如果没有足够的像素可绘制每个凹口，则QDial将跳过这些凹口以尝试绘制统一的集合（例如，每隔第二或第三个凹口绘制一次）。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the slider, QDial attempts to draw a "nice" number of notches rather than one per line step. If possible, the number of notches drawn is one per line step, but if there aren't enough pixels to draw every one, QDial will skip notches to try and draw a uniform set (e.g. by drawing every second or third notch).
trans-unit.target: 与滑块不同的是,QDial试图绘制一个 "漂亮的 "凹槽数量,而不是每行步一个。如果可能的话,每个行步画一个缺口,但是如果没有足够的像素来画每一个缺口,QDial将跳过缺口来尝试画一个统一的集合(例如,通过画每第二个或第三个缺口)。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the window managers for top-level windows, all window flags (Qt::WindowFlags) are supported by QMdiArea as long as the flags are supported by the current widget style. If a specific flag is not supported by the style (e.g., the WindowShadeButtonHint), you can still shade the window with showShaded().
trans-unit.target: 不同的是窗口管理器的顶级窗口，所有窗口标志（Qt的:: WindowFlags）是由支持QMdiArea只要标志由当前控件样式的支持。如果样式不支持特定标志（例如WindowShadeButtonHint），则仍可以使用showShaded（）来为窗口着色。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the window managers for top-level windows, all window flags (Qt::WindowFlags) are supported by QMdiArea as long as the flags are supported by the current widget style. If a specific flag is not supported by the style (e.g., the WindowShadeButtonHint), you can still shade the window with showShaded().
trans-unit.target: 与顶级窗口的窗口管理器不同，QMdiArea支持所有窗口标志（Qt :: WindowFlags），只要当前窗口小部件样式支持该标志即可。如果样式不支持特定标志（例如WindowShadeButtonHint），则仍可以使用showShaded（）来为窗口着色。

trans-unit.source: Unlike views like PathView and ListView, however, there is always a current item (when the model isn't empty). This means that when count is equal to 0, currentIndex will be -1. In all other cases, it will be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: 但是，与PathView和ListView之类的视图不同，始终有一个当前项（当模型不为空时）。这意味着当count等于 0 时，currentIndex将为 -1 。在所有其他情况下，它将大于或等于 0 。

trans-unit.source: Unlike when using normal class instances (with independent properties and signal emissions), QtRO automatically synchronizes changes to the shared object across all of its copies. With a few exceptions, these copies have the identical Qt API as the original object, and are meant to be used exactly as if the original object were available.
trans-unit.target: 与使用普通类实例(具有独立的属性和信号发射)时不同,QtRO会自动在其所有副本中同步共享对象的变化。除了少数例外,这些副本拥有与原始对象完全相同的Qt API,并打算完全像原始对象一样使用。

trans-unit.source: Unlike widgets, QWindows receive touch events always, there is no need to opt in. When working directly with a QWindow, it is enough to reimplement QWindow::touchEvent().
trans-unit.target: 与窗口小部件不同，QWindows总是接收触摸事件，无需选择加入。直接使用QWindow时，重新实现QWindow :: touchEvent（）就足够了。

trans-unit.source: Unlike with the destructor, it is expected that render() can reinitialize all resources it needs when called after a call to releaseResources().
trans-unit.target: 与析构函数不同，期望在调用releaseResources（）之后调用render（）时，它可以重新初始化所需的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Unshaded materials are useful when interacting with scene lighting is not necessary or desired, and the material needs full control on the final fragment color. Notice how the example above has neither a DirectionalLight nor any other lights, but the sphere with the custom material shows up as expected.
trans-unit.target: 当不需要或不希望与场景照明交互时，无阴影材质非常有用，并且该材质需要完全控制最终片段的颜色。请注意，上面的示例既没有DirectionalLight也没有任何其他光源，但是带有自定义材质的球体按预期显示。

trans-unit.source: Unshaded materials are useful when the object's appearance is determined completely by the custom shader code. The shaders for such materials receive minimal additions by the engine, and therefore it is completely up to the shader to determine the final fragment color. This gives more freedom, but also limits possiblities to integrate with other elements of the scene, such as lights.
trans-unit.target: 当对象的外观完全由自定义着色器代码决定时,无阴影材质是有用的。这种材质的着色器得到引擎的最小添加,因此完全由着色器来决定最终的碎片颜色。这提供了更多的自由度,但也限制了与场景中其他元素(如灯光)整合的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Upon reception, the senderAddress() and senderPort() properties contain the address and port of the peer that sent the datagram, while destinationAddress() and destinationPort() contain the target that was contained in the datagram. That is usually an address local to the current machine, but it can also be an IPv4 broadcast address (such as "255.255.255.255") or an IPv4 or IPv6 multicast address. Applications may find it useful to determine if the datagram was sent specifically to this machine via unicast addressing or whether it was sent to multiple destinations.
trans-unit.target: 接收时，senderAddress（）和senderPort（）属性包含发送数据报的对等方的地址和端口，而destinationAddress（）和destinationPort（）包含数据报中包含的目标。这通常是当前计算机本地的地址，但也可以是IPv4广播地址（例如“ 255.255.255.255”）或IPv4或IPv6多播地址。应用程序可能会发现确定数据报是通过单播寻址专门发送到此计算机还是是否已发送到多个目的地很有用。

trans-unit.source: Upon start-up of your application, connect all signals in QInAppStore to related slots in your own QObject. Then use the registerProduct() function to register the ID of each product you expect to find registered in the external store, as well as its type.
trans-unit.target: 启动应用程序后，将QInAppStore中的所有信号连接到您自己的QObject中的相关插槽。然后，使用registerProduct（）函数注册您希望在外部商店中找到注册的每个产品的ID及其类型。

trans-unit.source: Url string of a custom tile server. This parameter should be set to a valid server url offering the correct osm API. To use this server, the Map::activeMapType parameter of the Map should be set to the supported map type whose type is MapType.CustomMap. This map type is only be available if this plugin parameter is set, in which case it is always Map::supportedMapTypes[supportedMapTypes.length - 1].
trans-unit.target: 自定义切片服务器的网址字符串。此参数应设置为提供正确osm API的有效服务器URL。要使用此服务器，该地图:: activeMapType的参数映射应设置为支持的地图类型，其类型为的MapType .CustomMap。仅在设置了此插件参数的情况下，此地图类型才可用，在这种情况下，它始终为Map :: supportedMapTypes [supportedMapTypes.length-1]。

trans-unit.source: Url string set when making network requests to the geocoding server. This parameter should be set to a valid server url with the correct osm API. If not specified the default url will be used.
trans-unit.target: 向地理编码服务器发出网络请求时设置的网址字符串。此参数应使用正确的osm API设置为有效的服务器网址。如果未指定，将使用默认URL。

trans-unit.target: 向场所服务器发出网络请求时设置的URL字符串。此参数应使用正确的osm API设置为有效的服务器网址。如果未指定，将使用默认URL。

trans-unit.source: Url string set when making network requests to the routing server. This parameter should be set to a valid server url with the correct osrm API. If not specified the default url will be used.

trans-unit.source: Urls are resolved to be within the same directory as the target of the base URL meaning any portion of the path after the last '/' will be ignored.

trans-unit.source: Usage is to declare POD followed by the name for the generated type, followed by type and name pairs separated by commas, where the type/name pairs are wrapped in parentheses.

trans-unit.source: Usage is to declare SIGNAL followed by the desired signature wrapped in parentheses. The void return value should be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 用法是声明 SIGNAL ,然后在括号中包装所需的签名。无效返回值应被跳过。

trans-unit.source: Usage is to declare SLOT followed by the desired signature wrapped in parentheses. The return value can be included in the declaration. If the return value is skipped, void will be used in the generated files.
trans-unit.target: 用法是声明 SLOT ,然后在括号中包装所需的签名。返回值可以包含在声明中。如果跳过返回值，则将在生成的文件中使用void。

trans-unit.source: Use QAxBase::dynamicCall() and QAxBase::querySubObject() as well as the QObject::setProperty() and QObject::property() APIs to call the methods and properties of the COM object through their name. Use the dumpdoc tool to get the documentation of the Qt API for any COM object and its subobjects; note that not all of the COM object's APIs might be available.
trans-unit.target: 使用QAxBase :: dynamicCall（）和QAxBase :: querySubObject（）以及QObject :: setProperty（）和QObject :: property（）API通过名称来调用COM对象的方法和属性。使用dumpdoc工具获取任何COM对象及其子对象的Qt API文档；请注意，并非所有COM对象的API都可用。

trans-unit.source: Use QAxBase::dynamicCall() and QAxBase::querySubObject() as well as the QObject::setProperty() and QObject::property() APIs to call the methods and properties of the COM object through their name. Use the dumpdoc tool to get the documentation of the Qt API for any COM object and its subobjects; note that not all of the COM object's APIs might be available.

trans-unit.source: Use toTimeSpec() to express a datetime in local time or UTC, toOffsetFromUtc() to express in terms of an offset from UTC, or toTimeZone() to express it with respect to a general time zone. You can use timeSpec() to find out what time-spec a QDateTime object stores its time relative to. When that is Qt::TimeZone, you can use timeZone() to find out which zone it is using.
trans-unit.target: 使用toTimeSpec（）以当地时间或UTC表示日期时间，使用toOffsetFromUtc（）表示相对于UTC的偏移量，或使用toTimeZone（）表示相对于一般时区的日期时间。您可以使用TIMESPEC（）来找出时间规范中的一个QDateTime对象存储的时间相对。当它是Qt :: TimeZone时，您可以使用timeZone（）找出它正在使用哪个区域。

trans-unit.source: Use toTimeSpec() to express a datetime in local time or UTC, toOffsetFromUtc() to express in terms of an offset from UTC, or toTimeZone() to express it with respect to a general time zone. You can use timeSpec() to find out what time-spec a QDateTime object stores its time relative to. When that is Qt::TimeZone, you can use timeZone() to find out which zone it is using.
trans-unit.target: 使用toTimeSpec（）以当地时间或UTC表示日期时间，使用toOffsetFromUtc（）表示相对于UTC的偏移量，或使用toTimeZone（）表示相对于一般时区的日期时间。您可以使用timeSpec（）来找出QDateTime对象存储其相对时间的时间规范。当它是Qt :: TimeZone时，您可以使用timeZone（）找出它正在使用哪个区域。

trans-unit.source: Use type() to determine whether a coordinate is a 2D coordinate (has latitude and longitude only) or 3D coordinate (has latitude, longitude and altitude). Use distanceTo() and azimuthTo() to calculate the distance and bearing between coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 使用类型（）来确定坐标是2D坐标（仅具有纬度和经度）还是3D坐标（具有纬度，经度和高度）。使用distanceTo（）和azimuthTo（）计算坐标之间的距离和方位。

trans-unit.source: Use merge() to merge one item selection into another without making overlapping ranges. Use split() to split one selection range into smaller ranges based on a another selection range.
trans-unit.target: 使用merge（）将一个项目选择合并到另一个项目中，而不会产生重叠范围。使用split（）可以根据另一个选择范围将一个选择范围分成较小的范围。

trans-unit.source: Use evaluate() to evaluate script code.
trans-unit.target: 使用评估（）评估脚本代码。

trans-unit.source: Use newObject() to create a JavaScript object; this is the C++ equivalent of the script statement new Object(). You can use the object-specific functionality in QJSValue to manipulate the script object (e.g. QJSValue::setProperty()). Similarly, use newArray() to create a JavaScript array object.
trans-unit.target: 使用newObject（）创建一个JavaScript对象；这与脚本语句 new Object() 的C ++等效。您可以在QJSValue中使用特定于对象的功能来操作脚本对象（例如QJSValue :: setProperty（））。同样，使用newArray（）创建一个JavaScript数组对象。

trans-unit.source: Use newQMetaObject() to wrap a QMetaObject; this gives you a "script representation" of a QObject-based class. newQMetaObject() returns a proxy script object; enum values of the class are available as properties of the proxy object.
trans-unit.target: 使用newQMetaObject（）包装QMetaObject ; 这为您提供了基于QObject的类的“脚本表示形式” 。newQMetaObject（）返回代理脚本对象；该类的枚举值可用作代理对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: Use newQObject() to wrap a QObject (or subclass) pointer. newQObject() returns a proxy script object; properties, children, and signals and slots of the QObject are available as properties of the proxy object. No binding code is needed because it is done dynamically using the Qt meta object system.
trans-unit.target: 使用newQObject（）包装QObject（或子类）指针。newQObject（）返回代理脚本对象；属性，子对象以及QObject的信号和插槽可用作代理对象的属性。不需要绑定代码，因为它是使用Qt元对象系统动态完成的。

trans-unit.source: Use equals() or strictlyEquals() to compare a QJSValue to another.
trans-unit.target: 使用的equals（）或strictlyEquals（）的比较QJSValue到另一个。

trans-unit.source: Use equals() or strictlyEquals() to compare a QJSValue to another.

trans-unit.source: Use QMainWindow::restoreState() to restore the geometry and the state of toolbars and dock widgets.
trans-unit.target: 使用QMainWindow :: restoreState（）恢复工具栏和停靠小部件的几何形状和状态。

trans-unit.source: Use QMainWindow::saveState() to save the geometry and the state of toolbars and dock widgets.
trans-unit.target: 使用QMainWindow :: saveState（）保存几何图形以及工具栏和停靠小部件的状态。

trans-unit.source: Use name() for the enumerator's name. The enumerator's keys (names of each enumerated item) are returned by key(); use keyCount() to find the number of keys. isFlag() returns whether the enumerator is meant to be used as a flag, meaning that its values can be combined using the OR operator.
trans-unit.target: 使用name（）作为枚举器的名称。枚举器的键（每个枚举项的名称）由键（）返回；使用keyCount（）查找键数。isFlag（）返回是否将枚举数用作标志，这意味着可以使用OR运算符组合其值。

trans-unit.source: Use SkeletonLoader if you wish to load a whole skeleton from file rather than creating the joints yourself using Skeleton and Joints. Creating a skeleton and binding the vertices of a mesh to the skeleton is most easily performed in a 3D digital content creation tool such as Blender. The resulting skeleton and mesh can then be exported in a suitable format such as glTF 2 for consumption by Qt 3D.
trans-unit.target: 使用SkeletonLoader如果你希望从文件加载一个整体框架，而不是使用骨骼和关节自己创造的关节。在3D数字内容创建工具（例如Blender）中，最容易执行创建骨架并将网格的顶点绑定到骨架的操作。然后，可以以合适的格式（例如glTF 2）导出生成的骨架和网格，以供Qt 3D使用。

trans-unit.source: Use DynamicParameter instead.
trans-unit.target: 请改用DynamicParameter。

trans-unit.source: Use setCurrentIndex() to set its value.
trans-unit.target: 使用setCurrentIndex（）设置其值。

trans-unit.source: Use WorkerScript to run operations in a new thread. This is useful for running operations in the background so that the main GUI thread is not blocked.

trans-unit.target: 使用QPainter :: fontInfo（）获取绘画时的字体信息。在与屏幕不兼容的绘画设备上绘画时，这也会给出正确的结果。

trans-unit.source: Use QPixmapCache::insert() to receive an instance of Key generated by the pixmap cache. You can store the key in your own objects for a very efficient one-to-one object-to-pixmap mapping.
trans-unit.target: 使用QPixmapCache :: insert（）接收由像素映射缓存生成的Key实例。您可以将密钥存储在自己的对象中，以实现非常高效的一对一对象到像素映射。

trans-unit.source: Use QPluginLoader in the application to load the plugins.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序中使用QPluginLoader加载插件。

trans-unit.source: Use setMinimum() and setMaximum() or the constructor to set the number of "steps" in the operation and call setValue() as the operation progresses. The number of steps can be chosen arbitrarily. It can be the number of files copied, the number of bytes received, the number of iterations through the main loop of your algorithm, or some other suitable unit. Progress starts at the value set by setMinimum(), and the progress dialog shows that the operation has finished when you call setValue() with the value set by setMaximum() as its argument.
trans-unit.target: 使用setMinimum（）和setMaximum（）或构造函数来设置操作中的“步数”，并在操作进行时调用setValue（）。步数可以任意选择。它可以是复制的文件数，接收的字节数，通过算法主循环的迭代数或其他合适的单位。进度从setMinimum（）设置的值开始，并且进度对话框显示以setMaximum（）设置的值作为参数调用setValue（）时操作已完成。

trans-unit.source: Use QSkeleton if you wish to manually create the joints of a skeleton for use with skinned meshes. This is mainly of use to people creating editors, tooling, or dynamic skeletons. It is more common that a Qt 3D application would simply consume an existing skeleton and skinned mesh as created in a digital content creation tool such as Blender. For this use case, please see QSkeletonLoader.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望手动创建用于蒙皮网格物体的骨架关节，请使用QSkeleton。这主要用于创建编辑器，工具或动态框架的人员。更常见的是，Qt 3D应用程序会简单地消耗现有的骨架和蒙皮网格，如在Blender等数字内容创建工具中创建的那样。对于此用例，请参见QSkeletonLoader。

trans-unit.source: Use QSKIP() to handle cases where a whole test function is found at run-time to be inapplicable in the current test environment. When just a part of a test function is to be skipped, a conditional statement can be used, optionally with a qDebug() call to report the reason for skipping the inapplicable part.
trans-unit.target: 使用QSKIP（）处理在运行时发现整个测试功能不适用于当前测试环境的情况。当只跳过测试功能的一部分时，可以使用条件语句，可以选择使用 qDebug() 调用来报告跳过不适用部分的原因。

trans-unit.source: Use setHtml() or setPlainText() directly to avoid text edit's guessing.
trans-unit.target: 直接使用setHtml（）或setPlainText（）可以避免文本编辑的猜测。

trans-unit.source: Use say() to start synthesizing text. It is possible to specify the language with setLocale(). To select between the available voices use setVoice(). The languages and voices depend on the available synthesizers on each platform. On Linux, speech-dispatcher is used by default.
trans-unit.target: 使用say（）开始合成文本。可以使用setLocale（）指定语言。要在可用声音之间进行选择，请使用setVoice（）。语言和声音取决于每个平台上可用的合成器。在Linux上，默认情况下使用 speech-dispatcher 。

trans-unit.source: Use wait() to block the calling thread, until the other thread has finished execution (or until a specified time has passed).
trans-unit.target: 使用wait（）阻止调用线程，直到另一个线程完成执行（或直到经过指定的时间）为止。

trans-unit.source: Use C++ for dynamic data sets that are large or frequently modified.
trans-unit.target: 将C ++用于大型或经常修改的动态数据集。

trans-unit.source: Use crossProduct() to compute the cross-product of
trans-unit.target: 使用crossProduct（）计算

trans-unit.source: Use QWebEnginePage::scripts() and QWebEngineProfile::scripts() to access the collection of scripts associated with a single page or a number of pages sharing the same profile.
trans-unit.target: 使用QWebEnginePage :: scripts（）和QWebEngineProfile :: scripts（）访问与单个页面或共享同一配置文件的多个页面关联的脚本集合。

trans-unit.source: Use QWebEngineProfile::cookieStore() and QQuickWebEngineProfile::cookieStore() to access the cookie store object for a specific profile.
trans-unit.target: 使用QWebEngineProfile :: cookieStore（）和QQuickWebEngineProfile :: cookieStore（）访问特定配置文件的cookie存储对象。

trans-unit.source: Use QWidget::setScreen() to create a QWidget on a specific display; note that this does not move a widget to a screen in a virtual desktop setup.
trans-unit.target: 使用QWidget :: setScreen（）在特定的显示器上创建QWidget；请注意，这不会将窗口小部件移至虚拟桌面设置中的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Use QWidget::windowHandle() to get a QWindow pointer from a QWidget instance. At app startup the QWindow might not have been created yet, call QWidget::winId() to make sure it is.
trans-unit.target: 使用QWidget :: windowHandle（）从QWidget实例获取QWindow指针。在应用程序启动的QWindow可能没有被创建，调用了QWidget :: winId（），以确保它是。

trans-unit.source: Use QWidget::windowModality instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用QWidget :: windowModality代替。

trans-unit.source: Use index() to locate the position of an attribute in the list, count() to retrieve the number of attributes, and clear() to remove the attributes. New attributes can be added with append(). Use type() to get an attribute's type and value() to get its value. The attribute's name is available from localName() or qName(), and its namespace URI from uri().
trans-unit.target: 使用index（）在列表中找到属性的位置，使用count（）检索属性的数量，并使用clear（）删除属性。可以使用append（）添加新属性。使用type（）获取属性的类型，使用value（）获取其值。该属性的名称可从localName（）或qName（）获得，其名称空间URI可从uri（）获得。

trans-unit.source: Use QXmlQuery::bindVariable() to bind the QXmlNodeModelIndex to $variable name;
trans-unit.target: 使用QXmlQuery :: bindVariable（）将QXmlNodeModelIndex绑定到 $variable name ；

trans-unit.source: Use configure -list-features to show a list of all available features on the command line. Note that features can depend on other features, so disabling a feature might have side-effects on other features.
trans-unit.target: 使用configure -list-features在命令行上显示所有可用功能的列表。请注意，功能可能取决于其他功能，因此禁用功能可能会对其他功能产生副作用。

trans-unit.source: Use <func> for translating strings instead of tr().
trans-unit.target: 使用 <func> 而不是 tr() 来翻译字符串。

trans-unit.source: Use Directory and setOption(ShowDirsOnly, true) instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Directory 和setOption（ShowDirsOnly，true）代替。

trans-unit.source: Use \ to escape the special characters listed above to use them as separators.
trans-unit.target: 使用 \ 转义上面列出的特殊字符以将它们用作分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Use configure -list-features to show a list of all available features on the command line. Note that features can depend on other features, so disabling a feature might have side-effects on other features.
trans-unit.target: 使用 configure -list-features 可以在命令行上显示所有可用功能的列表。请注意，功能可能取决于其他功能，因此禁用功能可能会对其他功能产生副作用。

trans-unit.source: Use console.log, console.debug, console.info, console.warn, or console.error to print debugging information to the console.
trans-unit.target: 使用 console.log ， console.debug ， console.info ， console.warn 或 console.error 将调试信息打印到控制台。

trans-unit.target: 使用 emsdk 安装特定的 emscripten 版本。例如，要为Qt 5.15安装它，请输入：

trans-unit.target: 使用 viewport->update() 来更新视口的内容，而不是update（），因为所有绘制操作都在视口上进行。

trans-unit.source: Use AM/PM display.
trans-unit.target: 使用AM/PM显示。

trans-unit.source: Use AdjustToContents or AdjustToContentsOnFirstShow instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AdjustToContents 或 AdjustToContentsOnFirstShow 来代替。

trans-unit.source: Use AnchorAtOffsetMatchOption instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用AnchorAtOffsetMatchOption代替。

trans-unit.source: Use Case: GPS
trans-unit.target: 使用案例。GPS
